00025 Bank::Bank(QDomNode &memoryMapNode): MemoryMapItem(memoryMapNode), items_(),
00026 memoryBlockData_(0) {
00027 
00028         // the temporary variables to store the parsed values for memoryBlockData_
00029         General::Usage usage = General::UNSPECIFIED_USAGE;
00030         General::BooleanValue volatileValue = General::BOOL_UNSPECIFIED;
00031         General::Access access = General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS;
00032         QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> > tempParameters;
00033 
00034         for (int i = 0; i < memoryMapNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00035 
00036                 QDomNode tempNode = memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i);
00037 
00038                 // get SubSpaceMap
00039                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:subspaceMap")) {
00040                         SubspaceMap *temp = new SubspaceMap(tempNode);
00041                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(temp));
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 // get Bank
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:bank")) {
00046                         Bank *temp = new Bank(tempNode);
00047                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(temp));
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 // get addressBlock
00051                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressBlock")) {
00052                         AddressBlock *temp = new AddressBlock(tempNode);
00053                         items_.append(QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(temp));
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 // get usage
00057                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:usage")) {
00058                         usage = General::str2Usage(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue(),
00059                                         General::UNSPECIFIED_USAGE);
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 // get volatile
00063                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:volatile")) {
00064                         QString volatileStr = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00065                         volatileValue = General::str2BooleanValue(volatileStr);
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 // get access
00069                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:access")) {
00070                         access = General::str2Access(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00071                                         nodeValue(), General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS);
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 // get parameters
00075                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00076 
00077                         // go through all parameters
00078                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00079 
00080                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00081                                 Parameter *temp = new Parameter(parameterNode);
00082                                 tempParameters.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(temp));
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085         }
00086 
00087         // parsing information is over so save the values to memoryBlockData
00088         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00089                         new MemoryBlockData(usage, volatileValue, access, tempParameters));
00090         tempParameters.clear();
00091 
00092         // if mandatory elements are missing
00093         if (!MemoryMapItem::attributes_.contains(QString("spirit:bankAlignment"))) {
00094                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:bankAlignment"
00095                                 " missing in spirit:bank"));
00096         }
00097 
00098         // if no items are specified
00099         if (items_.size() == 0) {
00100                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("No items specified in spirit:bank"));
00101         }
00102 }
00103 
00104 Bank::Bank( const Bank &other ):
00105 MemoryMapItem(other),
00106 items_(),
00107 memoryBlockData_() {
00108 
00109         foreach (QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> memItem, other.items_) {
00110                 if (memItem) {
00111 
00112                         AddressBlock* addrBlock = dynamic_cast<AddressBlock*>(memItem.data());
00113                         Bank* bank = dynamic_cast<Bank*>(memItem.data());
00114                         SubspaceMap* subMap = dynamic_cast<SubspaceMap*>(memItem.data());
00115                         QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> copy;
00116 
00117                         if (addrBlock) {
00118                                 copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00119                                         new AddressBlock(*addrBlock));
00120                         }
00121                         else if (bank) {
00122                                 copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00123                                         new Bank(*bank));
00124                         }
00125                         else if (subMap) {
00126                                 copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00127                                         new SubspaceMap(*subMap));
00128                         }
00129                         if (copy)
00130                                 items_.append(copy);
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 
00134         if (other.memoryBlockData_) {
00135                 memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00136                         new MemoryBlockData(*other.memoryBlockData_.data()));
00137         }
00138 }
00139 
00140 Bank & Bank::operator=( const Bank &other ) {
00141         if (this != &other) {
00142                 MemoryMapItem::operator=(other);
00143 
00144                 items_.clear();
00145                 foreach (QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> memItem, other.items_) {
00146                         if (memItem) {
00147 
00148                                 AddressBlock* addrBlock = dynamic_cast<AddressBlock*>(memItem.data());
00149                                 Bank* bank = dynamic_cast<Bank*>(memItem.data());
00150                                 SubspaceMap* subMap = dynamic_cast<SubspaceMap*>(memItem.data());
00151                                 QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem> copy;
00152 
00153                                 if (addrBlock) {
00154                                         copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00155                                                 new AddressBlock(*addrBlock));
00156                                 }
00157                                 else if (bank) {
00158                                         copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00159                                                 new Bank(*bank));
00160                                 }
00161                                 else if (subMap) {
00162                                         copy = QSharedPointer<MemoryMapItem>(
00163                                                 new SubspaceMap(*subMap));
00164                                 }
00165                                 if (copy)
00166                                         items_.append(copy);
00167                         }
00168                 }
00169 
00170                 if (other.memoryBlockData_) {
00171                         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>(
00172                                 new MemoryBlockData(*other.memoryBlockData_.data()));
00173                 }
00174                 else
00175                         memoryBlockData_ = QSharedPointer<MemoryBlockData>();
00176         }
00177         return *this;
00178 }

00180 Bank::~Bank() {
00181         items_.clear();
00182 
00183         memoryBlockData_.clear();
00184 }
00185 
00186 void Bank::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00187         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:bank");
00188 
00189         // write the base class information
00190         MemoryMapItem::write(writer);
00191 
00192         // write the collection of addressblocks, banks or subspaceMaps
00193         for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i) {
00194                 items_.at(i)->write(writer);
00195         }
00196 
00197         if (memoryBlockData_) {
00198                 memoryBlockData_->write(writer);
00199         }
00200 
00201         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:bank
00202 }
